name: Critically Endangered
description:
TAKE PART in DRIVING pandas AWAY from EXTINCTION! DOMINATE the predators with LARGE numbers of P A N D A S!!! Get READY to play a KEY role in helping the miniature PANDAS to a safe future! SUMMON TONS of pandas and OVERPOWER the PREDATORS! There are FIVE waves... and one of them can be fatal...

BEST OF LUCK!! The future of PANDAS depends on you.

P.S. Bamboo Factories are basically the key to victory.
